io.micronaut.http.server.types.files

Class AttachedFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.http.server.types.files.SystemFileCustomizableResponseType
      • io.micronaut.http.server.types.files.AttachedFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomizableResponseType, FileCustomizableResponseType

    public class AttachedFile
extends SystemFileCustomizableResponseType
    Used as the return value of a route execution to indicate the given file should be downloaded by the client instead of displayed.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    James Kleeh
